name: 🐦Stay with the Flock 🦅
description:
-ESTIMATED PLAY TIME-

10-15 min

-CONTROLS-

  •  WASD / Arrow keys: Bird control
  • Space: Flapping 
  • Left Click / M: Brake

-OBJETIVE-

Stay with the flock(🐦🐦🐦) to prevent to be eaten by the evil eagle (🦅) . 

We hope you enjoy our little game, and give us some feedback!
